GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS SCORE HUGE_VEHICLE UNIQUE_UNIT LARGE_RECTANGLE_PATHFIND ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT VEHICLE ANTI_GARRISON LINE_OF_SIGHT_IGNORES_BUILDINGS CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Selected" or Prev == "STATE_Run" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_built" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_built") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Idle" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end;
